column2: A group of [Root.TOW_GetEventCreepsName]s have appeared in the province of [Root.GetName]. They are threatening our realm and hampering our merchants!
The [Root.TOW_GetEventCreepsName]s have pillaged [pillaged_holding.GetBaseName] in the county of [Root.GetName]!

Word has it that a fight occured in [Root.GetName]. It involved [Root.TOW_GetEventCreepsName]s and [Root.TOW_GetEventCreeps2Name]s, squabbling until a battle started between their tribes. [Root.TOW_GetWinningEventCreepsText]

The [Root.TOW_GetEventCreepsName]s in the province of [Root.GetName] have a new leader, the powerful [leader.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]. They have settled in a tribe in the county. They are contesting our rule in the province and are attacking us for its control!

The adventurer [random_adventurer.GetTitledName] is going on an adventure to deal with the [Root.TOW_GetEventCreepsName]s in [Root.GetName]. We hope [random_adventurer.GetSheHe] succeeds in [random_adventurer.GetHerHis] endeavors.
It appears that the [Root.TOW_GetWinningEventCreepsName] tribe overwhelmed their opponent and found themselves victorious.
No tribe came on top during this battle, both sides losing an unsubstantial amount of soldiers and getting tired. They ended up walking back to their respective homes.
Colonize a county to gain its control, however, remnants of creeps settlements will stay in the conquered province. The county will become a colony that will grow slowly at a monthly cost.
Launch an insurrection to conquer the county.
Creeps can conquer counties of other creeps for a small cost in prestige. If used on a ruler with the same race, its clan will be vassalized. Otherwise, the county will be taken under your rule.
